contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced stub|auto=yes|date=December 2009}} {{Infobox stadium | stadium_name = Yokkaicchi Dome | image = [[Image:四日市ドーム.JPG|300px|Nagoya Dome]] | location = [[Yokkaichi, Mie]], [[Japan]] | opened = August 1, 1997 | owner = | operator = | surface = Short Pile Artificial turf | construction_cost = | architect = | tenants = | seating_capacity = 4,704 | dimensions = 124.45 meters × 78.00 meters (9,707m²) }} '''Yokkaichi Dome''' is a multi-purpose [[indoor arena|indoor sporting arena]] located in [[Yokkaichi, Mie|Yokkaichi]], [[Mie Prefecture]], Japan. The capacity of the arena is 4,704 people. It was built in 1997 as one of the events commemorating the 100th anniversary of the establishment of Yokkaichi as a city. {{Coord|34|58|59|N|136|38|51|E|type:landmark_scale:2000|display=title}} [[Category:Indoor arenas in Japan]] [[Category:Sports venues in Mie Prefecture]] {{Japan-stadium-stub}}
